name: overgrow

effect.diamond-pearl: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect.platinum: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

short_effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.platinum: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
